notes:
Training Preferences:
- Tuesday: Interval training with running club (group workout)
- Thursday: Track intervals with running club (~10km total)
- Sunday: Long run day (preferred for weekly long run)
- Cycling: Avoid back-to-back days, prefer Mon/Wed/Sat or similar spacing
- Swimming: Once per week (Tue or Thu evening preferred)

Important: Tuesday and Thursday runs are with the club and should be interval/tempo sessions. Sunday is for long aerobic runs.
